def_en: A patina is a thin layer of something that has formed on the surface of something.

def_cn: （旧东西年深日久产生的）包浆，光泽
def_en: The patina on an old object is an attractive soft shine that has developed on its surface, usually because it has been used a lot.
If you say that someone has a patina of a quality or characteristic, you mean that they have a small but impressive amount of this quality or characteristic.
